title: Introduction to Homeopathic Detox & Drug Layers
description: INSTANT ACCESS 'Do I need to detox a toxin/drug/medication/etc in order to fully heal?' This 75 minute class helps answer this plus more including: - Can constitutional remedies detox? - Intro to drug layers, Tautopathy & Isopathy - Drainage pathways - Intro to CEASE therapy & Homeopathic Detox Therapy + 90 min Q&A replay with Wren Lloyd This course is for INFORMATION only & does not constitute medical advice.
